BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER

SUMMARY

An experienced manager who is highly motivated and has vast knowledge of the retail industry.
As a perfect role model for the team, able to coach, give feedback, build morale, roll out initiatives, and make recommendations on merchandising and product presentation.
Able to handle high-profile and hands-on management roles that require commercial acumen and creative flair.
As an exceptional person and also able to drive brand availability, & willing to take on board new ideas & adapt them further to make them my own.
I am ambitious and passionate about everything and comes from a strong sales and service background that allows to thrive in any competitive and challenging retail environments.
Right now ready and qualified for the next stage in an already hugely successful career and is looking forward to making a significant contribution to any future employer
